epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement User Authentication and Security Features
epics.description: Develop a secure login system with multi-factor authentication, including email or SMS-based codes, to ensure that only authorized users can access the portal. Implement security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a Personalized Dashboard for Users
epics.description: Design and develop a personalized dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. This dashboard will provide quick access to frequently used services and alerts related to user activity.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification
epics.summary: Enable Account Opening and Service Modification Requests
epics.description: Build workflows that allow users to submit requests for opening new accounts or modifying existing services. Ensure the processes are streamlined and require minimal clicks. The workflows should integrate with the bank's core system to validate requests.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide Real-Time Status Updates and Email Notifications
epics.description: Develop a system to provide users with real-time status updates on their service requests. Implement email notification functionality to keep users informed about the progress of their requests and any required actions.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.description: Ensure that all user interactions with the portal are logged and can be accessed by users to review their transaction history. Develop reporting features to help users track and manage their past activities.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Implement Responsive Design for Multiple Devices
epics.description: Design and develop the portal to be fully responsive, ensuring a consistent and user-friendly experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Optimize layouts and interactions for touch and mouse inputs.

epics.title: Save and Resume Applications
epics.summary: Allow Users to Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
epics.description: Build functionality that enables users to save their progress on incomplete applications and return to complete them at a later time. Include options for uploading documentation directly through the portal's interface.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Integrate with Existing Core Banking System
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the portal with the bank's existing core banking system. Implement data synchronization mechanisms to maintain optimal performance and reliability while storing transaction data in a separate portal database.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and enforce role-based access controls to ensure that users can only view and access the services and information appropriate to their profile and authorization level.
